fields.name: owner
fields.description: the identifier of the owner (for players: 'citizen:<citizen_id>', for businesses: 'business:<business_id>')

functions.name: GetBalance
functions.description: Returns the account balance.

functions.name: SetBalance
functions.description: Sets the account balance to the given amount.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: the new account balance

functions.name: AddBalance
functions.description: Adds the given amount to the account balance.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: the amount to add

functions.name: RemoveBalance
functions.description: Removes the given amount from the account balance.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: the amount to remove

functions.name: GetOwnerType
functions.description:
Checks the type of owner of the account.
The owner type is the prefix of the owner identifier (e.g., 'citizen' or 'business').

returns.name: ownerType
returns.description: the type of owner of the account

functions.name: GetOwner
functions.description: Returns the owner of the account.

functions.name: Save
functions.description: Saves the account data to the database.

functions.name: Create
functions.description: Creates a new account for the given owner.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the player who will own the account

functions.name: ById
functions.description: Retrieves an account by its account ID.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: the unique account ID

returns.name: account
returns.description: the retrieved account or nil if not found

fields.name: citizenID
fields.description: the unique citizen ID of this character

fields.name: ownerID
fields.description: the license ID of the player who owns this character

fields.name: accountID
fields.description: the account ID associated with this character

fields.name: citizenID
fields.description: the unique citizen ID of this character

fields.name: ownerID
fields.description: the license ID of the player who owns this character

fields.name: accountID
fields.description: the account ID associated with this character

fields.name: firstname
fields.description: the first name of the character

fields.name: lastname
fields.description: the last name of the character

fields.name: dateOfBirth
fields.description: the date of birth of the character (YYYY-MM-DD)

fields.name: bloodType
fields.description: the blood type of the character

fields.name: fingerPrint
fields.description: the finger print of the character

functions.name: GetOwner
functions.description: Returns the XCore.Player who owns this character.

returns.name: owner
returns.description: the player who owns this character or nil if the player is not online

functions.name: GetAccount
functions.description: Returns the XCore.Account associated with this character.

returns.name: account
returns.description: the account associated with this character

functions.name: GetFullName
functions.description:
Returns the full name of the character.
That is "firstname lastname".

returns.name: fullName
returns.description: the full name of the character

functions.name: Save
functions.description: Saves the character data to the database.

functions.name: Create
functions.description: Creates a new Character.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: the player who will own the character.

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: the first name of the character.

parameters.name: lastname
parameters.description: the last name of the character.

parameters.name: dateOfBirth
parameters.description: the date of birth of the character (YYYY-MM-DD).

functions.name: ByCitizenID
functions.description: Returns the character by its citizen ID.

parameters.name: citizenID
parameters.description: the citizen ID of the character.

returns.name: xCharacter
returns.description: the character object, or nil if not found.

functions.name: ByOwnerID
functions.description: Loads all characters owned by the given owner ID.

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: the license ID of the owner.

returns.name: xCharacters
returns.description: the list of characters owned by the owner.

classes.name: FunctionFactory
classes.description:
a function factory allowes to create functions producing
functions for xObjects. By trapping the given xObject inside the produced function,
the self reference problem when calling a function on a referenced object from another
resource is solved.

functions.name: ForXClass
functions.description: Creates a function factory for all functions in the given xClass.

parameters.name: xClass
parameters.description: the xClass containing functions

returns.name: factory
returns.description: the function factory for the xClass

functions.name: Apply
functions.description: Applies all functions from the function factory to the given xObject.

parameters.name: xObject
parameters.description: the xObject to which the functions should be applied

functions.name: HasPermission
functions.description: Checks if the player has the specified permission.

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: the permission to check

returns.name: hasPermission
returns.description: whether the player has the permission

functions.name: GetName
functions.description: Returns the name of the player.

functions.name: GetIdentifier
functions.description: Returns the unique identifier (license ID) of the player.

functions.name: TriggerEvent
functions.description: Triggers the given event with the given arguments for this player.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: the name of the event to trigger

functions.name: GetAllCharacters
functions.description: Returns all characters owned by the player.

returns.name: xCharacters
returns.description: the list of characters owned by the player

functions.name: ByIdentifier
functions.description: Returns the XPlayer object for the given license ID.

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: the player's license ID

returns.name: xPlayer
returns.description: the xcore player object, or nil if not found

functions.name: BySource
functions.description: Returns the XPlayer object for the given HPlayer.

parameters.name: hPlayer
parameters.description: the helix player object

fields.name: ACCOUNT_BALANCE_CHANGED
fields.description: the event that will be triggered, when an account's balance changes.

functions.name: printf
functions.description: Prints a formatted string to the console.

parameters.name: msg
parameters.description: the message to format

parameters.name: args
parameters.description: the arguments to replace in the message. Use {key} in the message to denote where to replace.

fields.name: ACCOUNT_BALANCE_CHANGED
fields.description: the event that will be triggered, when an account's balance changes.
